name: Aether's temple
description:
A song in praise of Aether, that which does nto have temples, but inhabits my poetry and spirit. The god of the superior world, inhabited by beings of light.

"AITHER (Aether) was the primordial god (protogenos) of light and the bright, blue ether of the heavens. His mists filled the space between the solid dome of the sky (ouranos) and the transparent mists of the earth-bound air (khaos, aer)."

"A story about the world? Yes yes, we know one"
This is how the journey of the artists to show their vision about the Greek gods and their forms begins.

#cryptoamigues #CryptOlimpianos
